vclaim: An "extreme snuff film" in which Hillary Clinton and aide Huma Abedin are seen raping and mutilating a prepubescent girl is circulating on the dark web under the code name "Frazzledrip."
title: Is a Hillary Clinton ‘Snuff Film’ Circulating on the Dark Web?
subtitle: Conspiracy theory web sites reported that Clinton could be seen mutilating a child during a Satanic ritual in an online video code-named "Frazzledrip."
author: David Emery
